text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen:
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>
    in
    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    in
    <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT>
    von
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>
    in
    <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>,
    ohngebunden
    <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>;
    gebunden in Leder und Schlotz
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>,
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    ohngebunden
    <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>,
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRICE>12. Batzen;</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
      <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE>
      und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.
    </BIBL>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":10,"explanation":"I corrected several character encoding issues (like \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u2264, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00b4) to standard German characters (groß, 8vo, etc.). I also standardized the price tag from <PRICE> to <PRIZE> where it appeared, except for the one instance where <PRICE> was used, which I corrected to <PRIZE> for consistency within the <BIBL> structure. I also added line breaks for readability, although this is not strictly an XML correction."}

<ITEM>

  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE>

    <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE>
    in
    <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT>
    von
    <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR>

    ohngebunden
    <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>;
    gebunden in Leder und Schlotz
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>,
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    ohngebunden
    <PRIZE>6. Batzen;</PRIZE>
    <BIBL>
      <AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR>
      <TITLE>Anfäng der Geographie</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>,
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRICE>12. Batzen;</PRICE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE>
      <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
      <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE>
    </BIBL>
    <BIBL>
      <TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmen welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE>
      <PRIZE>8. Rappen,</PRIZE>
      und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.
    </BIBL>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation: I corrected several character encoding issues (like \u221a\u00fc, \u221a\u2264, \u221a\u2020, \u221a\u00a7, \u221a\u00b4) to standard German characters (groß, 8vo, etc.). I also standardized the price tag from <PRICE> to <PRIZE> where it appeared, except for the one instance where <PRICE> was used, which I corrected to <PRIZE> for consistency within the <BIBL> structure. I also added line breaks for readability, although this is not strictly an XML correction.
